name: AddFollowersToTask
description:
Adds followers to an Asana task.

Use this tool to add one or more followers to a specific task in Asana. The request will return the updated task record, reflecting the changes.

parameters.name: task_gid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task to add followers to. This is required to specify which task the followers should be added to.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of optional task properties to include in the response.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: followers_identification
parameters.description: An array of strings identifying users, which can be 'me', an email, or a user gid.

value_schema.description: An array of strings identifying users. These can either be the string "me", an email, or the gid of a user.
